1.title: Le Bobotel

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

1.plot: After serving time for arson against his burned garage business, Bob gets a proposition from the Chamber of Commerce president to purchase a local rundown motel.

2.title: Rénos

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

2.plot: Pushed by the Chamber of Commerce president, Bob is renovating his new motel with his crew. Bob's brother, Rodger, advises him to consult a female psychologist to help him forget about Maggy.

3.title: Motel motards

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

3.plot: Bob and his motel crew are intimidated by two members of a biker gang in order to pay some protection insurance.

4.title: Le mononke

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

4.plot: Bob is on a breakdown due to his heartbreak. As per a TV ad in order to boost his spirit, he applies for a "big brother" association for child sponsorship.

5.title: Le party

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

5.plot: To get more patrons for his motel, Bob takes advice from the chamber of commerce president and asks the Total-Mart manager to organize a big party to promote Motel Bobotel.

6.title: Motel étouelle

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

6.plot: While trying to upgrade the motel for a higher rating on a tourist guidebook, Bob takes a private course on how to have class.

7.title: Éroticomotel

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

7.plot: Bob and the gang are making a porno movie at the motel.

8.title: Les folles

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

8.plot: Bob's gay brother, Rodger, asks him to sponsor and help in some way his gay indoor ringette team.

9.title: Motel Wong

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

9.plot: Bob's nemesis, Mr. Wong, opens a hotel of his own across from his Motel. With his crew, he thinks of a way to get rid of this competitor before he turns the area into a new Chinese suburb.

10.title: Weekend at Maggy's

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

10.plot: In an unusual circumstance, Maggy wants to be back with Bob, but his motel staff wants to keep her away from him.

11.title: Spa sérieux

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

11.plot: Bob opens a "spa" on his motel grounds, trying to impress the president of the local chamber of commerce.

12.title: Santa Banana 1/2

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

12.plot: Bob and Méo are going south on vacation to Santa Banana.

13.title: Santa Banana - 2e partie

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

13.plot: While Bob's in jail for accidental drug smuggling in Santa Banana, Méo becomes a banana tycoon for the "Presidente".

14.title: Le million du millionnaire 1/2

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

14.plot: To sell "Bobotel" motel franchises around the world, Bob is organizing a "Million Dollar" amateur contest. However, as Bob fixed the contest to let win Méo, Mike falls for a talented handicapped contestant.

15.title: Le million du millionnaire - 2e partie

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

15.plot: An unusual event takes place during the amateur contest, as Bob's master plan to let Méo win the contest might come apart.

1.title: Bob Is Back/Bob est dos

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

1.plot: Bob Gratton lives a happy suburb life, when suddenly two neighbors, a Quebec nationalist and a Muslim family, settle down in his neighborhood. Life won't be easy anymore.

2.title: Gratton vs Wong

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

2.plot: Bob takes measures to overcome competition from a Chinese-owned gas station who just opened across the street and selling gas at a cheaper price.

3.title: La chasse au canards

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

3.plot: Bob brings Méo to a duck hunt expedition.

4.title: Le car-wash érotique

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

4.plot: In order to crush the Chinese gas station competition, Bob ask the Chamber of Commerce president a permit to operate a "sexy car wash" with some luscious girls.

5.title: Environne-mental

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

5.plot: Bob gets a letter from the environment department to clean up the gas station. In the meanwhile, he responds to a lady in an Internet dating site for some sexy dates. However, his date might be in some compromising position.

6.title: Chien de service de garde

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

6.plot: Bob purchases a dog in the hopes of meeting women. On a stroll, he meets an interesting woman with same interests. However, she has a day care center; his goodwill might lose his new-bred relationship, especially when he helps her mind the kids.

7.title: Le coming-out

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

7.plot: Bob's older brother Rodger visits, and has to deal with a guy from l'Office québécois de la langue française.

8.title: Gagner une vedette

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

8.plot: A charity auction by the Chamber of Commerce offers "stars for a day" to help out businesses. Hoping to have a famous woman announcer for a day, Bob sends out Mike to the event, while Méo and himself are outside parking cars. However, Mike happens to chose an actor instead of the expected star.

9.title: Méo malade

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

9.plot: Bob must mind his brother-in-law Méo at the hospital, stricken with a possible deadly disease. Paul asks Bob to promote an upcoming gay parade.

10.title: Camping

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

10.plot: Bob goes on a camping trip with his neighbor and his sexy sister.

11.title: Voisins noirs

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

11.plot: New Haitian neighbors arrive in the neighborhood. Bob has interest for one of the teen girls from this family.

12.title: Who's Your Daddy

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

12.plot: Bob's gay brother, Rodger, dumps his father at his place. While trying so hard to mind his irate father, Bob must think of the next TV commercial for his garage.

13.title: Santé coeur

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

13.plot: Bob searches for his "Bobette", while trying to get into shape.

1.title: Lune de fiel

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

1.plot: Bob and his new flame Maggy go on a RV trip to the USA. Méo is in charge of the garage, and the workmates don't like it.

2.title: Le golf

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

2.plot: In order to have a video poker machine in his gas station, like his girlfriend Maggy at the flower shop, Bob asks her to convince the president of the local chamber of commerce during a golf tournament.

3.title: Big W

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

3.plot: Bob is at crossroads: Maggy wants to settle down with him but wants a new house, and a big American gas station chain want to sell him a franchise... How much can it cost for both ?

4.title: Gratton's Eleven

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

4.plot: When the gas station franchise president evicts everyone from the site to replace them with Mexican employees, Bob uses his staff to get revenge and take back the site.

5.title: Amitié et pilosité

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

5.plot: Maggy wants Bob to modernize his look.

6.title: On déménage

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

6.plot: Bob and Maggy sell their house, and move to the new Total-Mart community of Frais-chié-sur-le-lac.

7.title: L'échevin

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

7.plot: Bob is chosen by the Chamber of Commerce president to present himself as a city counselor in the next municipal election. However, two things can prevent him to win: his too-good neighbor who runs against him, and his swearing habit.

8.title: TV Gratton

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

8.plot: The president of the Chamber of Commerce asks Bob to take charge of the local community TV station as director of programming.

9.title: La sauce à Linda - 2e partie

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

9.plot: Bob's ex-wife, Linda, comes back from nowhere and sues her former husband for illegally using her spaghetti sauce recipe for commercial purposes.

10.title: Big thérapie

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

10.plot: Bob brings his employees to a three day motivation trip in the woods. Bob and Méo's girlfriends secretly follows them, suspecting they'll meet strippers.

11.title: Ta-Bal-Nac

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

11.plot: Bob's gay brother and his boyfriend leave their adopted Chinese daughter to him and Maggy. However the latter go to a conference, leaving Bob, Méo and the garage crew to babysit the little baby girl.

12.title: Chirurgie piassetique

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

12.plot: To ease his girlfriend Maggy nervous breakdown due to her physique, Bob pays her an extreme makeover, which may have consequences way over the money he will spend for this operation.

13.title: La fuite

episode of.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life (TV Series 2007– )

13.plot: Having lost his garage, his girlfriend and his house, Bob goes to his shack in the woods with Méo.

locations: 2074 Rue Jean-Paul-Riopelle, Longueuil, Québec, Canada::(Bob's second house)
880 Rue Lamarre, La Prairie, Québec, Canada::(Bob's first house)
A La Fleuristerie Majarie - 332 Boulevard Notre-Dame-des-Champs, Repentigny, Québec, Canada::(Fleuriste Maggy Guimond)
Canadian Tire - 2211 Boulevard Roland-Therrien, Longueuil, Québec, Canada::(Total-Mart)
Garage Roza - 3200 Rue Monselet, Montréal-Nord, Québec, Canada::(Garage Bob Gratton)
Motel Le Flambeau - 890 Rue Notre-Dame, Repentigny, Québec, Canada::(Bobotel, demolished)
imdb.plot outline: La toute première télé-réalité plus vraie que nature au Québec, où les petits détails de la vie quotidienne deviennent des événements lorsqu'ils son vécus par notre méga Bob Gratton. Nous serons les témoins privilégiés de ses premières expériences dans une soirée pour célibataires, ses premières expériences dans un centre de thalassothérapie et de sa participation au Défilé de la Fierté Gaie en tant que «guérisseur d'homosexuels».
imdb.title: Bob Gratton, ma vie/My Life
plot: La toute première télé-réalité plus vraie que nature au Québec, où les petits détails de la vie quotidienne deviennent des événements lorsqu'ils son vécus par notre méga Bob Gratton. Nous serons les témoins privilégiés de ses premières expériences dans une soirée pour célibataires, ses premières expériences dans un centre de thalassothérapie et de sa participation au Défilé de la Fierté Gaie en tant que «guérisseur d'homosexuels».
